title: Istanbul tantalizes with its mix of cultures
text: BING NEWS: Istanbul tantalizes with its mix of cultures ISTANBUL — For years, my graduate school buddy had extended an invitation: “Come, visit me in Istanbul,” he said. “You’ll like it.” Finally, I had the chance.
